SEARCH
Package org.attribyte.snook

Class StaticAssetsConfig

java.lang.Object
org.attribyte.snook.StaticAssetsConfig
public class StaticAssetsConfig extends Object
Configuration for a servlet that handles static files.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    CACHE_CONTROL_HEADER_PROPERTY
    The property that configures the cache control header value ("cacheControl").
    final String
    cacheControl
    If non-empty, this Cache-Control header is added to every response.
    static final String
    DIRECTORY_ALLOWED_PROPERTY
    The property that indicates if directory listing is allowed ("directoryAllowed").
    final boolean
    directoryAllowed
    Are directory listings allowed?
    final boolean
    etags
    Are weak ETags generated and handled?
    static final String
    ETAGS_PROPERTY
    The property that indicates if weak Etags are enabled by default ("etags").
    final boolean
    gzip
    Is gzip enabled?
    static final String
    GZIP_PROPERTY
    The property that indicates if gzip is enabled by default ("gzip").
    static final String
    PATHS_PROPERTY
    The property name for a comma-separated list of resource paths ("paths").
    static final String
    RESOURCE_DIRECTORY_PROPERTY
    The property name for the directory containing static resources ("resourceDirectory").
    final String
    resourceDirectory
    The path to the directory containing static resources.

      Creates file servlet configuration from properties.
      Parameters:
      namePrefix - A prefix to be applied to names in the properties server. for example.
      props - The properties.
      Throws:
      org.attribyte.api.InitializationException - on invalid configuration.
